resources.string: This Ragam, we promise you an epic night, an experience like never before. We push new boundaries and bring to you, for the first time in South India, from halfway across the world, Swiss folk metal band, ELUVEITIE. Along with the typical lead, rhythm, base guitars and drums, Eluveitie continues to incorporate an armada of instruments that give their folk metal that really unique Celtic sound.

It is the electrifying crowd, the charge in the atmosphere and the sheer energy as you scream out that makes Ragam a memory worth saving. Create another memory on 28-th March, as Ragam\'15 proudly presents Ankit Tiwari, for the first time, on the largest stage in south India. Immerse yourself in music, as you are regaled by the versatile singer of famous tracks like Galliyan and the evergreen Sun Rahai Tu.

Ragam presents DJ Diego Miranda, all set to tear up the decks with his Indian debut at NIT Calicut. Get ready for a night of pure ebullience as he transcends minds and hijacks your feet. Come indulge in an experience like never before as the base becomes your heartbeat and the rhythm your movement

This is not just a fest, but the grandest of them all, where the best of the best find knighted in fame's hall. Dot your i's and cross your t's; the less fortunate gape 'cause it's really happening, so Don Your Capes.

Ragam is the annual cultural festival of NIT Calicut. Be there on March 26th-29th, 2015.

You can register for competitions and workshops from the Ragam website www.ragam.org.in
Experience is something that makes you stand out in a crowd. Come arm yourself with what it takes to succeed. Learn from the masters themselves
Learn about something new, be it dance, archery or even self defence. Learn to be a DJ. And more...
